src_original: prekṣya sa viṣayatṛākṛpaṇān anavasthitaṃ tapa iti nyavartata // Saund_3.2 //
tgt_original: tapase tataḥ kapilavāstu hayagajarathaughasaṃkulam |  śrīmadabhayapranuraktajanaṃ sa vihāya niścitamanā vanaṃ yayau ||1 ||  vividhāgamāṃstapasi tāṃśca vividhaniyamāśrayān munīn |  prekṣya sa viṣayatṛṣākṛpaṇānanavasthitaṃ tapa iti nyavartata ||2 ||

src_original: atha mokṣavādinam arāḍam upaśamamatiṃ tathoḍrakam /  tattvakṛtamatir upāsya jahāvayam apy amārga iti māgakovidaḥ // Saund_3.3 //
tgt_original: atha mokṣavādinamarāḍamupaśamamatiṃ tathodrakam |  tattvakṛtamatirupāsya jahāvayamapyamārga iti mārgakovidaḥ ||3 ||

src_original: sa vicārayan jagati kiṃ nu paramam iti taṃ tam āgamam /
tgt_original: sa vicārayan jagati kiṃ nu paramamiti taṃ tamāgamam |

src_original: niścayam anadhigataḥ parataḥ paramaṃ cacāra tapa eva duṣkaram // Saund_3.4 //
tgt_original: niścayamanadhigataḥ parataḥ paramaṃ cacāra tapa eva duṣkaram ||4 ||

src_original: atha naiṣa mārga iti vikṣya tad api vipulaṃ jahau tapaḥ /
tgt_original: atha naiṣa mārga iti vīkṣya tadapi vipulaṃ jahau tapaḥ |

src_original: dhyānaviṣayam avagamya paraṃ bubhuje varānnam amṛtatvabuddhaye // Saund_3.5 //
tgt_original: dhyānaviṣayamavagamya paraṃ bubhuje varānnamamṛtattvabuddhaye ||5 ||

src_original: sa suvarṇapīnayugabāhur ṛṣabhagatir āyatekṣaṇaḥ /  plakṣam avaniruham abhyagamat paramasya niścayavidher bubhutsayā // Saund_3.6 //
tgt_original: sa suvarṇapīnayugabāhurṛṣabhagatirāyatekṣaṇaḥ |  plakṣamavaniruhamabhyagamat paramasya niścayavidherbubhutsayā ||6 ||

src_original: upaviśya tatra kṛtabuddhir acaldhṛtir adrirājavat /  mārabalam ajayad ugram atho bubudhe padaṃ śivam ahāryam avyayam // Saund_3.7 //
tgt_original: upaviśya tatra kṛtabuddhiracaladhṛtiradrirājavat |  mārabalamajayadugramatho bubudhe padaṃ śivamahāryamavyayam ||7 ||

src_original: avagamya taṃ ca kṛtakāryam amṛtamanaso divaukasaḥ /
tgt_original: avagamya taṃ ca kṛtakāryamamṛtamanaso divaukasaḥ |

src_original: harṣam atulam agaman muditā vimukhī tu mārapariṣat pracukṣubhe // Saund_3.8 //  sanagā ca bhūḥ pravicāla hutavahasakaḥ śivo vavau /  nedur api ca suradundubhayaḥ pravavarṣa cāmbudharavarjitaṃ nabhaḥ // Saund_3.9 //
tgt_original: harṣatulamagaman muditā vimukhī tu mārapariṣat pracukṣubhe ||8 ||  sanagā ca bhūḥ pravicacāla hutabahasakhaḥ śivo vavau |  nedurapi ca suradundubhayaḥ pravavarṣa cāmbudharavarjitaṃ nabhaḥ ||9 ||

src_original: avabudhya caiva paramārtham ajaram anukampayā vibhuḥ /  nityam amṛtam upadarśyituṃ sa varāñasīparikarām ayāt purīm // Saund_3.10 //
tgt_original: avabudhya caiva paramārthamajaramanukampayā vibhuḥ |  nityamamṛtamupadarśayituṃ sa varāṇasīparikarāmayāt purīm ||10 ||

src_original: atha dharmacakram ṛtanābhi dhṛtimatisamādhinemimat /  tatra vinayanimāram ṛṣir jagato hitāya pariṣady avartayat // Saund_3.11 //
tgt_original: atha dharmacakramṛtanābhi dhṛtimatisamādhinemimat |  tatra vinayaniyamāramṛṣirjagato hitāya pariṣadyavartayat ||11 ||

src_original: iti duḥkham etad iyam asya samudayalatā pravartikā /  śāntir iyam ayam upāya iti pravibhāgaśaḥ param idaṃ catuṣṭayam // Saund_3.12 //  abhidhāya ca triparivartam atulam anivartyam uttamam /
tgt_original: iti duḥkhametadiyamasya samudayalatā pravartikā |  śāntiriyamayamupāya iti pravibhāgaśaḥ paramidaṃ catuṣṭayam ||12 ||  abhidhāya ca triparivartamatulamanivartyamuttamam |

src_original: dvādaśaniyatavikalpam ṛṣir vinināya kauṇḍinasagotram āditaḥ // Saund_3.13 //
tgt_original: dvādaśaniyatavikalpaṃ ṛṣirvinināya kauṇḍinasagotramāditaḥ ||13 ||

src_original: sa hi doṣasāgaram agādham upadhijalam ādhijanutkam /  krodhamadabhayatarṅgacalaṃ pratatāra lokam api vyatārayat // Saund_3.14 //
tgt_original: sa hi doṣasāgaramagādhamupadhijalamādhijantukam |  krodhamadabhayataraṅgacalaṃ pratatāra lokamapi ca vyatārayat ||14 ||

src_original: sa vinīya kāśiṣu gayeṣu bahujanam atho girivraje /
tgt_original: sa vinīya kāśiṣu gayeṣu bahujanamatho girivraje |

src_original: pitryam api paramakāruṇiko nagaraṃ yayāv anujighṛkṣayā tadā // Saund_3.15 //
tgt_original: pitryamapi paramakāruṇiko nagaraṃ yayāvanujighṛkṣayā tadā ||15 ||

src_original: viṣayātmakasya hi ianasya bahuvividhamārgasevinaḥ /
tgt_original: viṣayātmakasya hi janasya bahuvividhamārgasevinaḥ |

src_original: sūryasadṛśavapur abhyudito vijahāra sūrya iva gautamas tamaḥ // Saund_3.16 //
tgt_original: sūryasadṛśavapurabhyudito vijahāra sūrya iva gautamastamaḥ ||16 ||

src_original: abhitas tataḥ kapilavāstu paramaśubhavāstusaṃstutam /  vastumatiśuci śivopavanaṃ sa dadarśa niḥspṛhatayā yathā vanam // Saund_3.17 //
tgt_original: abhitastataḥ kapilavāstu paramaśubhavāstusaṃstutam |  vastumatiśuci śivopavanaṃ sa dadarśa niḥspṛhatayā yathā vanam ||17 ||

src_original: aparigrahaḥ sa hi babhūva niyatamatir ātmanīśvaraḥ /
tgt_original: aparigrahaḥ sa hi babhūva niyatamatirātmanīśvaraḥ |

src_original: naikavidhabhayakareṣu kim-u svajanasvadeśajanamitravastuṣu // Saund_3.18 //
tgt_original: naikavidhabhayakareṣu kimu svajanasvadeśajanamitravastuṣu ||18 ||

src_original: pratipūjayā na sa jaharṣa na ca śucam avajñayāgamat /  niścitamatir asicandanayor na jagāma duḥkhasukhayoś ca vikriyām // Saund_3.19 //
tgt_original: pratipūjayā na sa jaharṣa na ca śucamavajñayāgamat |  niścitamatirasicandanayorna jagāma duḥkhasukhayośca vikriyām ||19 ||

src_original: atha pārthivaḥ samupalabhya sutam upagataṃ tathāgatam /
tgt_original: atha pārthivaḥ samupalabhya sutamupagataṃ tathāgatam |

src_original: tūrṇam ababhuturagānugataḥ sutadarśanotsukatayābhiniryayau // Saund_3.20 //  sugatas tathāgatam avekṣya narapatim adhīram āśayā /
tgt_original: tūrṇamabahuturagānugataḥ sutadarśanotsukatayābhiniryayau ||20 ||  sugatastathāgatamavekṣya narapatimadhīramāśayā |

src_original: śeṣam api ca janam aśrumukhaṃ vinīṣaya gaganam utpapāta ha // Saund_3.21 //  sa vicakrame divi bhuvīva punar upaviveśa tasthivān /  niścalamatir aśayiṣṭa punar bahudhābhavat punar abhūt tathaikadhā // Saund_3.22 //
tgt_original: śeṣamapi ca janamaśrumukhaṃ vininīṣayā gaganamutpapāta ha ||21 ||  sa vicakrame divi bhuvīva punarupaviveśa tasthivān |  niścalamatiraśayiṣṭa punarbahudhābhavat punarabhūttathaikadhā ||22 ||

src_original: salile kṣitāv iva cacāra jalam iva viveṣa medinīm /
tgt_original: salile kṣitāviva cacāra jalamiva viveśa medinīm |

src_original: megha iva divi vavarṣa punaḥ punar ajvalan nava ivodito raviḥ // Saund_3.23 //
tgt_original: megha iva divi vavarṣa punaḥ punarajvalannava ivodito raviḥ ||23 ||

src_original: yugapaj jvalan jvalanavac ca jalam avasṛhaṃś ca meghavat /  taptakanakasadṛśaprabhayā sa babhau pradīpta iva sandhyayā ghanaḥ // Saund_3.24 //  tam udīkṣya hemamaṇijālavalayinam ivotthitaṃ dhvajam /
tgt_original: yugapajjvalan jvalanavacca jalamavasṛjaṃśca meghavat |  taptakanakasadṛśaprabhayā sa babhau pradīpta iva sandhyayā ghanaḥ ||24 ||  tamudīkṣya hemamaṇijālavalayinamivotthitaṃ dhvajam |

src_original: prītim agamad atulāṃ nṛpatir janatā natāś ca bahumānam abhyayuḥ // Saund_3.25 //
tgt_original: prītimagamadatulāṃ nṛpatirjanatā natāśca bahumānamabhyayuḥ ||25 ||

src_original: atha bhājanīkṛtam avekṣya manujapatim ṛddhisaṃpadā /
tgt_original: atha bhājanīkṛtamavekṣya manujapatimṛddhisaṃpadā |

src_original: paurajanam api ca tatpravaṇaṃ nijagāda dharmavinayaṃ vināyakaḥ // Saund_3.26 //
tgt_original: paurajanamapi ca tatpravaṇaṃ nijagāda dharmavinayaṃ vināyakaḥ ||26 ||

src_original: nṛpatis tataḥ prathamam āpa phalam amṛtadharmasiddhayoḥ /
tgt_original: nṛpatistataḥ prathamamāpa phalamamṛtadharmasiddhaye |

src_original: dharmam atulam adhigamya muner munaye nanāma sa yato gurāv iva // Saund_3.27 //
tgt_original: dharmamatulamadhigamya munermuṃnaye nanāma sa yato gurāviva ||27 ||

src_original: bahavaḥ prasannamanaso 'tha jananamaraṇārtibhīravaḥ /
tgt_original: bahavaḥ prasannamanaso'tha jananamaraṇārtibhīravaḥ |

src_original: śākyatanayavṛṣabhāḥ kṛtino vṛṣabhā invānalabhayāt pravavrajuḥ // Saund_3.28 //
tgt_original: śākyatanayavṛṣabhāḥ kṛtino vṛṣabhā ivānalabhayāt pravavrajuḥ ||28 ||

src_original: vijahus tu ye 'pi na gṛhāṇi tanayapitṛmātrapekṣayā /
tgt_original: vijahustu ye'pi na gṛhāṇi tanayapitṛmātrapekṣayā |

src_original: te 'pi niyamavidhimāmaraṇāj jagṛhuś ca yuktamanasaś ca daghrire // Saund_3.29 //
tgt_original: te'pi niyamavidhimāmaraṇājjagṛhuśca yuktamanasaśca dadhrire ||29 ||

src_original: na jihiṃsa sūkṣmam api jantum api paravadhopajīvanaḥ /
tgt_original: na jihiṃsa sūkṣmamapi jantumapi paravadhopajīvinaḥ |

src_original: kiṃ bata vipulaguñaḥ kulajaḥ sadayaḥ sadā kimu muner upāsayā // Saund_3.30 //
tgt_original: kiṃ bata vipulaguṇaḥ kulajaḥ sadayaḥ sadā kimu munerupāsayā ||30 ||

src_original: akṛśodhyamaḥ kṛśadhano 'pi paraparibhavāsaho 'pi san /  nānyadhanam apajahāra tathā bhujagād ivānyavibhavād dhi vivyathe // Saund_3.31 //
tgt_original: akṛśodyamaḥ kṛśadhano'pi paraparibhavāsaho'pi san |  nānyadhanamapahāra tathā bhujagādivānyavibhavāddhi vivyathe ||31 ||

src_original: vibhavānvito 'pi taruṇo 'pi viṣayacapalendriyo 'pi san /
tgt_original: vibhavānvito'pi taruṇo'pi viṣayacapalendriyo'pi san |

src_original: naiva ca parayuvatīr agamat paramaṃ hi tā dhanato 'py amanyata // Saund_3.32 //
tgt_original: naiva ca parayuvatīragamat paramaṃ hi tā dahanato'pyamanyata ||32 ||

src_original: anṛtaṃ jagāda na ca kaś cid ṛtam api jajalpa nāpriyam /  ślakṣṇam api ca na jagāv ahitaṃ hitam apy uvāca na ca paiśunāya yat // Saund_3.33 //
tgt_original: anṛtaṃ jagāda na ca kaścidṛtamapi jajalpa nāpriyam |  ślakṣṇamapi ca na jagāvahitaṃ hitamapyuvāca na ca paiśunāca yat ||33 ||

src_original: manasā lulobha na ca jātu paravasuṣu gṛddhamānasaḥ /
tgt_original: manasā lulobha na ca jātu paravasuṣu gṛddhamānasaḥ |

src_original: kāmasukham asukhato vimṛśan vijahāra tṛpta iva tatra sajjanaḥ // Saund_3.34 //
tgt_original: kāmasukhamasukhato vimṛśan vijahāra tṛpta iva tatra sajjanaḥ ||34 ||

src_original: na parasya kaś cid apaghātam api ca sgṛṇo vyacintayat /
tgt_original: na parasya kaścidapaghātamapi ca saghṛṇo vyacintayat |

src_original: mātṛpiṛsutasuhṛsadṛśaṃ sa dadarśa tatra hi paras paraṃ janaḥ // Saund_3.35 //
tgt_original: mātṛpitṛsutasuhṛtsadṛśaṃ sa dadarśa tatra hi parasparaṃ janaḥ ||35 ||

src_original: niyataṃ bhaviṣyati paratra bhavad api ca bhūtam apy atho /  karmaphalam api ca lokagatir niyateti darśanam avāpa sādhu ca // Saund_3.36 //
tgt_original: niyataṃ bhaviṣyati paratra bhavadapi ca bhūtamapyatho |  karmaphalamapi ca lokagatirniyateti darśanamavāpa sādhu ca ||36 ||

src_original: iti karmañā daśavidhena paramakuśalena bhūriṇā /
tgt_original: iti karmaṇā daśavidhena paramakuśalena bhūriṇā |

src_original: bhraṃśini śitahilaguṇo 'pi yuge vijahāra tatra munsaṃśrayaj janaḥ // Saund_3.37 //
tgt_original: bhraṃśini śithilaguṇo'pi yuge vijahāra tatra munisaṃśrayājjanaḥ ||37 ||

src_original: na ca tatra kaś cid upapattisukham abhilalāṣa tair guṇaiḥ /
tgt_original: na ca tatra kaścidupapattisukhamabhilalāṣa tairguṇaiḥ |

src_original: sarvam aśivam avagamya bhavaṃ bhavasaṃkṣayāya vavṛte na janmane // Saund_3.38 //
tgt_original: sarvamaśivamavagamya bhavaṃ bhavasaṃkṣayāya vavṛte na janmane ||38 ||

src_original: akathaṅkathā gṛhiṇa eva paramapariśuddhadṛṣtayaḥ /
tgt_original: akathaṃkathā gṛhiṇa eva paramapariśuddhadṛṣṭayaḥ |

src_original: srotasi hi vavṛtire bahavo rajasas tanutvam api cakrire pare // Saund_3.39 //
tgt_original: strotasi hi vavṛtire bahavo rajasaṃstanutvamapi cakrire pare ||39 ||

src_original: vavṛte 'tra yo 'pi viṣameṣu vibhavadṛśeṣu kaś cana /  tyāgavinayaniyamābhirato vijahāra so 'pi na cacāla satpathāt // Saund_3.40 //
tgt_original: vavṛte'tra yo'pi viṣayeṣu vibhavasadṛśeṣu kaścana |  tyāgāvinayaniyamābhirato vijahāra so'pi na cacāla satpathāt ||40 ||

src_original: api ca svato 'pi parato 'pi na bhayam abhavan na daivataḥ /
tgt_original: api ca svato'pi parato'pi na bhayamabhavanna daivataḥ |

src_original: tatra ca susukhasubhikṣaguṇair jahṛṣuḥ prajāḥ kṛtayuge manor iva // Saund_3.41 //
tgt_original: tatra ca susukhasubhikṣaguṇairjahṛṣuḥ prajāḥ kṛtayuge manoriva ||41 ||

src_original: iti muditam anāmayaṃ nirāpat kururaghupurupuropamaṃ puraṃ tat /
tgt_original: iti muditamanāmayaṃ nirāpat kururaghupūrupuropamaṃ puraṃ tat |

src_original: abhavad abhayadaiśike maharṣau viharati tatra śivāya vītarāge // Saund_3.42 //
tgt_original: abhavadabhayadaiśike maharṣau viharati tatra śivāya vītarāge ||42 ||

src_original: CANTO IV
tgt_original: saundaranande mahākāvye 'tathāgata-varṇana' nāma tṛtīya sarga samāpta |  caturthaḥ sargaḥ  bhāryā-yācitaka
